title: Create a Purchase Order for Raw Materials
description: A buyer needs to create a purchase order (PO) for a critical raw material that is below its reorder point.

tasks.description: Identify the material that is below the reorder point and its primary supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the part number and the approved supplier from the ERP system.

tasks.description: Create a new purchase order with the correct part number, quantity, and pricing based on the supplier contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully drafts a PO with all required information.

tasks.description: Submit the purchase order to the supplier via the supplier portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the PO and its status changes to 'Submitted'.
